Function reference

All functions

epict()
Model Cycle Thresholds
epict_check_obs()
Check processed observations meet package specifications
epict_check_raw_obs()
Check unproccessed observations meet the package specification
epict_clean_factors()
Clean up factor levels
epict_drop_na_ct()
Drop Ct values with no data
epict_filter_ids()
Filter infection IDs based on characteristics
epict_flag_spurious_ids()
Flag potentially spurious IDs
epict_formula_as_data_list()
Format formula data for use with stan
epict_individual_priors_as_data_list()
FUNCTION_TITLE
epict_inits()
Set up initial conditions for model
epict_make_time_rel()
Make time relative to first test in the data
epict_make_time_rel_to_first_uncensored()
Make time relative to first uncensored test per ID
epict_model()
Load and compile the Cycle thresholds model
epict_opts_as_data_list()
Format model options for use with stan
epict_population_priors_as_data_list()
FUNCTION_TITLE
epict_posterior_as_prior()
Extract summarised posteriors to use as priors
epict_priors()
Default model priors
epict_to_stan()
Format data for use with stan
